content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Had two dishes: brisket salad had a chance to be excellent if not too much dressing; deep fried chicken in Korean source was of Panda Express quality, two dishes only before tips -$55.30 (no drinks); overpriced for this type of food. Was the only guest at 6:30pm; must be more of a late night place Â rather than a traditional eating restaurant. There were multiple cigarette butts on the outdoor patio in front of entrance.
